biotools.summary: CircAST (CircRNAs with Alternative Spliced Transcripts) is a computational tool for circular RNA full-length assembly and quantification using RNA-Seq data with the back-spliced events detected by upstream circRNA identification tools, such as UROBORUS, CIRI2, or CIRCexplorer2.

bioschemas.name: CircAST
bioschemas.summary: CircAST (CircRNAs with Alternative Spliced Transcripts) is a computational tool for circular RNA full-length assembly and quantification using RNA-Seq data with the back-spliced events detected by upstream circRNA identification tools, such as UROBORUS, CIRI2, or CIRCexplorer2.
